metadata.description: An email or group that the blog updates will be sent to

Power_Automate_No_updates.inputs: No new Power Automate updates this week

Power_Apps_No_Updates.inputs: No new Power Apps updates this week

No_Power_BI_Update.inputs: No new Power BI updates this week

Copilot_Studio_No_Update.inputs: No new Copilot Studio updates this week

No_Power_Pages_Update.inputs: No new Power Pages updates this week

No_Platform_Updates.inputs: No new Power Platform updates this week

Generate_Email_Body.inputs:

@{variables('varPowerPlatformEmailBody')}
